channel.title: Not a single NPC on server
channel.description:
Greetings,
I have my source its online and well. But i can't see any NPC they're not spawned. everyone logs in can play fine. But i noone can see a npc? Help me out please. ( PI source ) and linux centos vps
Add me on msn mertens_darry@hotmail.be skype : darry.mertens1
friendly greetings.

item.title: Not a single NPC on server
item.dc:creator: @aquatizscape aquatizscape
item.description:
@aquatizscape wrote:

Type ::reloadnpcs
Compile restart.
Teleport somewhere.
Teleport home. Wala

Read full topic
